snippet.title: Sonic Skyfall - Fangame Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY THE DEMO: https://sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-skyfall-sage-2024-demo.2144/

GameJolt Page: https://gamejolt.com/games/sonicskyfall/825066
Sonic Skyfall YouTube Channel: @sonicskyfall 

(This video was marked automatically as Made For Kids by YouTube's bullshit systems. This video, along with the rest of my content, should not be viewed by children under the age of 13. Kindly visit the Sonic Skyfall YouTube Channel for further updates on this game! Sorry for the inconvenience!!)

After intercepting a series of strange signals, Sonic & Tails journey upwards to the Atlas Sky Islands, a place long left adrift in the clouds above. Upon reaching their destination and crossing paths with Shadow, they'll soon find is that there is much more to these floating landmasses than meets the eye.

As Sonic, maximize your movement potential by utilizing both the Bounce Bracelet and a new ability; the Cylaunch, to reach new heights!

As Shadow, use Chaos Control to not only slow time, but also lower your own gravity and soar through the sky.

Sonic Skyfall is a brand new Sonic fangame being made with the Infinity Engine framework, taking inspiration from Unleashed, Colors, Generations, and Frontiers!

The release of the first demo is very close-by, and will feature the first four levels of the game!

All footage in this trailer represents a work in progress not indicative of the final product. Everything shown is subject to change.

Original designs and ideas by SEGA & Sonic Team. All registered trademarks belong to their respective owners.

Music Used: You Should Know - Pyrotechnica

VOICES:
Tails - @eney9754 
Shadow - @dedrede 
Rouge - @wintermelon 
Eggman - @Goopsy91 
Sonic - @soulcakelive
